name: Rock Bottom
summary: Rock Bottom starts off in prison. You have done three days of your fourteen day sentence and can’t take it anymore. You decide to break out of jail. How? Simply get a custume from Professor X, sneak into the prison guard’s masked ball and spike their punch with some weird chemical. Give a toast to a retired prison guard, everyone drinks the punch and they all pass out or die. Then you walk out of prison and start your life anew on some mean streets.
